div.p: AS KILLING JESUS REACHES 2 MILLION IN SALES, EVERYBODY
SHOULD KNOW, NOT EVERYBODY IS GOING TO LIKE IT.
AND FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY, EASY WAYS TO GET IT.
FOR EVERY GOOD SONG THERE ARE THREE BAD SONGS, SO YOU CAN HEAR
A GOOD SONG LIKE THE BEACH BOYS, HELP ME RONDA, THAT IS A GOOD
THING, BUT THEN YOU WILL HEAR HANG ON, SLOOPY, THAT IS WHY YOU
SHOULD CHECK OUT PANDORA, YOU TYPE IN THE SONG YOU LIKE AND
GET OTHER SONGS LIKE IT. YOU BASICALLY CREATE YOUR OWN
RADIO STATION, CHECK IT OUT. PANDORA.COM, CHECK IT OUT.
I HAVE NO INTEREST IN THE WEBSITE, I AM JUST TELLING YOU
BECAUSE I LIKE YOU. TIP OF THE DAY, CHECK IT OUT.
WE WOULD LIKE YOU TO SPOUT OFF ABOUT THE FACTOR ANYWHERE IN THE
